content: Comprehensive site testing - Fixed 4 critical crashes: Types tab (toLowerCase on undefined), Usage tab (empty SelectItem values), Contacts page (dual-format turso.execute), and preventive toLowerCase fixes across RedTagDashboard, LocationEquipmentViewer, CommunicationEquipmentSection. All Inventory tabs verified working. Contacts page verified working. Job creation and diagram tested successfully. Currently testing Y-adapter addition in Inventory - opened Add Equipment dialog to reproduce user-reported errors.
